fieldDescription:
Select the behaviour of the searchbar.


[Sort] - Sort the list based on the best match.
[Filter] - Remove entries that do not match the prompt enough.
[Sort & Filter] - Combined behaviour of the above.
Enables the search bar to also filter by design type/mod name in addition to weapon name.
Location of the Reset Button/Search Bar Filter Panel, 1 being the top, 4 at the bottom.
Location of the vanilla Weapon Availability/Weapon Slot filter Panel, 1 being the top, 4 at the bottom.
Location of the Weapon Type filter Panel, 1 being the top, 4 at the bottom. 0 to disable.
Location of the Damage Type/Range Slider filter Panel, 1 being the top, 4 at the bottom. 0 to disable.
The lower end of the range slider. Setting the range slider to this value includes all lower ranges.
The upper end of the range slider. Setting the range slider to this value includes all higher ranges.
Enables snapping to the nearest tick mark on the Range Slider.
The distance between each tick mark on the Range Slider.
The lower end of the range slider. Setting the range slider to this value includes all lower ranges.
The upper end of the range slider. Setting the range slider to this value includes all higher ranges.
Enables snapping to the nearest tick mark on the Range Slider.
The distance between each tick mark on the Range Slider.

An experimental feature that enables a quick and preset weapon simulation. Can be entered by pressing [F1] while hovering over a weapon in the weapons selection list in refit. The simulation equips a hyperion with the weapon you selected, facing you off against a medusa and an enforcer with no AI.
